text: momin mardon aur momin auraton se allaah ne aise baagon ka vaada kiya hai jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hongee, jinamen ve sadaiv rahenge aur sadaabahaar baagon mein pavitr nivaas grhon ka (bhee vaada hai) aur, allaah kee prasannata aur razaamandee ka; jo sabase badhakar hai. yahee sabase badee saphalata hai
